bioconda.name: peakzilla
bioconda.summary: Peakzilla identifies sites of enrichment and transcription factor binding sites from transcription factor ChIP-seq and ChIP-exo experiments at hight accuracy and resolution.

biocontainers.name: peakzilla
biocontainers.summary: Identify transcription factor binding sites from chip-seq data at high resolution.

biotools.summary: Identify transcription factor binding sites from ChIP-seq data at high resolution.

bioschemas.name: Peakzilla
bioschemas.summary: Identify transcription factor binding sites from ChIP-seq data at high resolution.
